dict.acceptation: 管理；管理人员；管理技巧，处事的能力；

sent.orig: It is a method of management rather than a kind of control.
sent.trans: 如果说是控制(control)，还不如说是管理(management)更为准确。

sent.orig: Still others, for example selling price and reorder point, are generated by or needed by MANAGEMENT.
sent.trans: 还有一些数据，例如销售价格和订货点由management产生，或者由它提出要求。

sent.orig: PDM (product data management) is an integrated technology to manage product-related datum and processes.
sent.trans: 产品数据管理(Product Data Management,PDM)是一项对产品相关的数据和过程进行集成化管理的技术。

sent.orig: Concepts of e-Business, e-Marketing, e-Government, e-Management, e-Home, e-Library, e-learning, etc. are becoming popular through the world.
sent.trans: e-Business、e-Marketing、e-Government、e-Management、e-Home、e-Library、e-Learn-ing等概念正在全世界范围内迅速流行。

sent.orig: Class management, file management, teaching project management, teacher management, curriculum management, and performance management.
sent.trans: 班级管理、档案管理、教学计划管理、教师管理、课程管理、成绩管理。
